question: Which of the following is the correct way to say hello in Japanese?

option2: Get off at the next stop regardless　降りる
option3: Stay on the train, adventure time!　そのまま
option4: Contemplate the meaning of life　人生って何

question: Which of the following is the correct way to say thank you in Japanese?

option1: Pick a dish at random. It'll probably be good
option2: Put on your best sad face and say 'Nihon go wakari masen'
